title: Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Cocktail
title_original: CHICME Women's Elegant Sleeveless Rhinestone Bodycon Midi Dress Square Neck Sparkly Cocktail Party Clubwear Dress

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #95,235 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #317 in Women's Cocktail Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Cocktail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just soooo gorgeous and shiny
items.body: Made from a high-quality blend of 45% Viscose, 50% Polyester, and 5% Elastane, this rhinestone midi dress offers a smooth, soft, and stretchy feel. The breathable, skin-friendly fabric ensures comfort while maintaining a structured, flattering fit This sleeveless midi dress features a chic square neckline and a flattering bodycon silhouette that perfectly contours your shape. The sleek pencil cut enhances your curves and creates an elegant, feminine look Adorned with sparkling rhinestones, this glitter dress adds a glamorous, eye-catching touch. The shimmering embellishments elevate your look with sophistication and make you shine with confidence at any event Pair this sparkly cocktail dress with high heels, statement jewelry, and a clutch for a glamorous look Perfect for cocktail parties, weddings, evening events, nightclubs, date nights, or any special celebration. This elegant rhinestone midi dress ensures you shine with confidence and timeless allure Read more
items.author: Cynthias Shelf Indulgence

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Figure flattering
items.body: The fit for the front of the dress is great! The style is fetching and figure flattering. Unfortunately, the back shoulder area doesn’t lay flat. It rumples or folds up. I plan to try having the back shoulder area tailored to fix the folds. Read more
items.author: Cheryl M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering cut, love the sparkle!
items.body: THis dress is a nice material with a little bit of stretch through out. The Back is a full zip and the rhinestones on it are placed so nicely to make the shape very flattering. Because of the bodycon style i opted to size up, it was a little longer than i wanted and a bit loose in my back but the small probably would have been too tight. The neckline is very flattering and the rhinestones felt pretty solid and would last when wearing. For reference - I am 5'5'', 135 lbs and wearing a medium. Read more
items.author: Em B

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall, very flattering with one small design quirk (on me)
items.body: This dress is really pretty and very flattering overall. I love the shine and the way the rhinestones contour the body. They create a pretty, slimming, hourglass effect and look just like the product photos. The rhinestones are definitely the standout feature for me. The fabric feels well-made and not cheap at all. It has a nice weight to it, the zipper in the back is smooth and sturdy. I ordered a Medium (also amazons suggested size) and the dress fits true to size. I’m 5’10” and about 150 lbs, 34C. I wouldn’t size up. The length hits in a great spot, perfect for a date night, cocktail event, or a night out with friends without feeling too short or overly revealing. The only thing holding this back from being a perfect 5 stars is the seam placement across the bust. On me, the neckline sits a bit higher than shown in the listing photos, which causes a seam to land higher across the bust area than expected. It’s not under the bust, more like halfway to two-thirds down...to me that placement feels a little odd. It’s not uncomfortable, just noticeable. That said, the dress still wears well and looks very nice once on. If that seam placement doesn’t bother you (and maybe its just on me), this is a really flattering, sparkly, versatile dress that could work for multiple occasions. Read more
items.author: Laura&Al

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning, Sparkly, and Perfect for Any Special Night Out
items.body: This CHICME sleeveless rhinestone bodycon dress is absolutely gorgeous and exceeded my expectations! The rhinestones catch the light beautifully, giving it a classy sparkle without feeling over the top. The square neckline is very flattering, and the material has just the right amount of stretch to hug your curves comfortably while still feeling supportive. It’s elegant enough for cocktail parties but also works perfectly for clubwear or a special date night. The length is a true midi, and the overall fit feels well-made for the price. If you want a dress that looks high-end and makes you feel confident, this one is a winner! Read more
items.author: Susana Jaramillo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress.
items.body: The dress appears very well made and has a nice design. The quality of fabric, decorative rhinestones, zipper and stitching is good. Red color is beautiful and vibrant. The dress is very stretchy and fits well. The fabric is a little on the simple side and not as heavy as I would like it to be to for more form fitting look. I ordered M but I think size small would fit me better. For reference, I am 5’11 , weight 135 pounds and 34 DD. The length is good, not too short for tall girls. Read more
items.author: AK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning LBD with the perfect sparkle!
items.body: This is the perfect little black dress if you want something elegant with just the right amount of sparkle. The rhinestone detailing instantly elevates the look without feeling over the top, and the placement along the sides creates a really flattering silhouette. It highlights your curves in a smooth, clean way and gives the whole dress a polished, expensive feel. The fabric has a nice stretch that makes it comfortable to move in, and it feels soft and breathable while still keeping its structure. The square neckline is very chic and adds a touch of sophistication. The midi length is exactly right for heels, boots, or dressy sandals, and the overall fit feels both classy and confident. This is a dress you can wear to cocktail parties, evening events, date nights, or any occasion where you want something glamorous without being flashy. It looks beautiful in person, photographs well, and has that timeless little black dress appeal with a modern twist. A standout piece that I am excited to wear again. Read more
items.author: aebryant

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and sexy
items.body: My only complaint is that the seam on the bodice is a little too high. The design of the dress clearly fits a larger chest, but the seams are in the wrong place to flatter it. I really did like the feel of the fabric, as well as the stretch. I found the neckline flattering. The dress stretched just enough to feel comfortable. It looks better on the website than in person, in terms of quality, but it was still pretty decent. Plus, sparkles! Read more
items.author: Sarah

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
